description: After a healthier hot cross bun recipe? Look no further than our take on this Easter classic that uses wholemeal flour, skim milk and rolled oats.
name: Healthier Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: BAKE: Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Brush tops with a little extra syrup to glaze. Serve topped with ricotta and extra syrup.
